Mon, 01 Jul 2024 06:58:44 +0000 Wednesday Davis died in a climbing accident on Mt Ruapehu on June 29.

Coroner releases video of Auckland man being Tasered during arrest, police CPR attempts before death in custody https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-releases-video-of-auckland-man-being-tasered-during-arrest-police-cpr-attempts-before-death-in-custody/25OLFY6UYJCQ7PEALU5K3INXMU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/coroner-releases-video-of-auckland-man-being-tasered-during-arrest-police-cpr-attempts-before-death-in-custody/25OLFY6UYJCQ7PEALU5K3INXMU/ Lane NicholsThe video shows the man attacking a pensioner before he is Tasered by police and arrested. Mon, 01 Jul 2024 02:38:53 +0000 Video footage shows police Tasering Alo Ngata after he attacked a pensioner in Freemans Bay in July 2018. Ngata was arrested and died in hospital three days later.

Woman dies from liver cancer after regular scans were stopped due to Health NZ system failure https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-dies-from-liver-cancer-after-regular-scans-were-stopped-due-to-health-nz-system-failure/4HQAKJN6VBFUVC5GO2DGJAWSOM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/woman-dies-from-liver-cancer-after-regular-scans-were-stopped-due-to-health-nz-system-failure/4HQAKJN6VBFUVC5GO2DGJAWSOM/ Hannah BartlettPatient had regular scans until 2019 when the surveillance ended.Mon, 01 Jul 2024 04:05:01 +0000 A woman at high risk of liver cancer was supposed to be given appointments for surveillance ultrasounds, but a systems change meant her scans were missed. By the time cancer was detected, it was already advanced and she later died.
